title: Hytrol Conveyor and Jonesboro Chamber of Commerce Host Manufacturing Day This Week
content: Jonesboro, AR -- (SBWIRE) -- 09/29/2015 -- Hytrol Conveyor Co., Inc. and the Jonesboro Regional Chamber of Commerce are teaming up on October 1, 2015 to host an event honoring local manufacturers. The Manufacturing Day event is one of over 1400 across the nation, and is an opportunity for companies to address challenges and concerns while celebrating the industry.
